text:
Java Back-end Developer | VENA SOLUTIONS | TORONTO, CA

Who are we? Check out the awesome work we’re up to at: https://engineering.vena.io

You will be responsible for building the backbone for the Vena platform, building REST web services with a very modern Java 8 backend stack.

We’re seeking innovative, analytical software engineers with an aptitude for big data, machine learning and server-side development who love to be continually challenged to create scalable and performant code.

You will work with a team of passionate, talented software engineers who love solving hard problems to build highly scalable web services, real-time systems, resilient services and so much more.

We can’t wait to hear from you! Apply at: https://bit.ly/1V544wW
